column4: little problem on maverick: when i'm playing on some games with snes9express on maverick, i get these games closed without any warning and after a little time after i start playing.
<chicca>ciao
Have you tried running the games from terminal and watching the output there? Usually if there's a crash without warning, the program spits out at least an error message.
No error messages?
pastebin please.
Does this happen with every game, or just some?
Also, props on the game choice there.
well, it happened with every game i tried
Strange. I'm not horribly familiar with snes9x these days, unfortunately. Could you give zsnes a shot and see if something similar happens?
Believe it's available in the Ubuntu repos as long as you're not running amd64. Been a while though.
ok, i can give znes a try, even though i always preferred snes9express xD
since before maverick i never had any problem on snes9express xD
Heh, I'm the opposite. Always preferred zsnes, never had a single problem with it, and always had issues with snes9x =P
with zsnes will i be able to use savefiles from snes9express?
The saveram (SRM) files are compatible, not too sure about savestates.
uhm, i'll give it a try
zsnes seems to be working. thanks for the suggestion
Happy to help.
last question about zsnes: is there a shortcut to save states?
f2 to save, f3 to pick, f4 to load
ok, thanks
You can change all that through the options if you're used to something else.
i only changed the game buttons since i'm used to the buttons of snes9express, but shortcuts to save and load are ok
